document.title: Council for Exceptional Children Life Centered Education Transition Curriculum

5D5707B44C784118A87D44C42435A985.description: Perform a job at expected levels of productivity.

40D3C753CC124B699AC0AF0965521D72.description: Work at expected levels of productivity

54F62A5F08044686964D787C564DF294.description: Identify acceptable and unacceptable reasons for tardiness and absenteeism.

6A0B0E7DF251444980AAFB0602928CA1.description: Identify reasons for good attendance and punctuality.

635C480998E24540B428D83F161FDA56.description: Recognize importance of attendance and punctuality

D0A7949E8C6D441DAD2C94E9D78CF604.description: Perform a series of tasks in response to written instructions.

7A8E4D47622F45458C68FE0EF276C128.description: Perform a series of tasks in response to verbal instructions.

BA80E8A8B18A42269EA64C5077D099B1.description: Identify factors that lead to advancement in employment.

B0B5412AA80A4470AD7636C06196ED83.description: Identify potential employment variations within a specific occupation.

1212913C94EC46EC813C16E2B69A55F2.description: Determine the level of personal abilities required for a specific occupation.

F5BBECED1C9141A7B135385204C5D394.description: Identify potential remedial activities that might be required by an occupation.

3C7E2E8294DB4B0EB40CD9E701F55479.description: Determine the competitive level of skill and performance required for essential functions a specific job.

F10D74F136BC4E5ABEB30042EA63CC66.description: Functions of meeting and exceeding job standards

5B3AC43E29C84C09B5E0CD829FB911FF.description: Identify resources for assistance if problems cannot be personally resolved.

782B4D1E7BA843708CBF43FAED0A2D11.description: For potential problems, identify possible solutions.

C597CC7FE08B4311BEEBBB78D6B0F6CD.description: Identify potential problems encountered on the job.

9A2717173054461CB530482DEA0C9D59.description: Obtain specific information about jobs of interest.

4B2FEEFD56524D93B5230EB8198AC565.description: Select an occupational area and find local employers in the Yellow Pages.

4B7C9604010E426FBD64CFC5E90279E1.description: Identify one kind of information provided by training information.

4BFD28D128614F329337D02477BA7EFB.description: List information provided by the sources from objective 1.
